items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.
items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.
items.title: trifkee/NavKit: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.

items.content_html: stick-n-roll is a lightweight and user-friendly npm package that enables HTML elements to have functionality similar to position: sticky, with the added ability to scroll the block.

items.content_html: A lightweight React context that leverages react-resize-detector to detect the current breakpoint based on an element's width. It provides utility functions and helper components to conditionally render content based on responsive breakpoints.
items.title: smartlabsAT/react-resize-detector-context: A lightweight React context that leverages react-resize-detector to detect the current breakpoint based on an element's width. It provides utility functions and helper components to conditionally render content based on responsive breakpoints.

items.content_html: ChronaGraph is a lightweight, TypeScript-based framework for building graph-based workflows and AI agents. Inspired by LangGraph, but with a focus on simplicity, speed, and ease of use.
items.title: philmetzger/ChronaGraph: ChronaGraph is a lightweight, TypeScript-based framework for building graph-based workflows and AI agents. Inspired by LangGraph, but with a focus on simplicity, speed, and ease of use.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.
